title: Gurman: New entry-level MacBook Pro with M2 chip coming this year, but no ProMotion
content:
In his latest edition of the Power On newsletter, Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman brings some tidbits about a new entry-level MacBook Pro with the rumored M2 processor.

more…

The post Gurman: New entry-level MacBook Pro with M2 chip coming this year, but no ProMotion appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: In his Power On newsletter, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman brings some tidbits about a new entry-level MacBook Pro with the rumored M2 processor.
